// import lifeImage from '../../image/Life.jpeg' import EditDelete from '../icons /EditDelete' import { SinglePost, SinglePostTitle, SinglePostInfo, Span, Name, SinglePostDescription, } from './Singlepost.styled' import { PostInfo } from '../post/Post.styled' const SinglePostCard = () => { return ( {PostInfo.map(({ id, title, postDate, description, image }) => (
{title} Author: Dohee Lee {postDate} {description}
))} ) } export default SinglePostCard
